sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>ear</radical> and the <radical>mouth</radical> of a <radical>king</radical> are <kanji>holy</kanji>. The king has holy hearing and holy eating abilities. This king is divine.
meaningInfo: See the holy ear and mouth of this king. They glisten and glitter and people write hymnals about their holy prowess. Imagine a song playing as you witness their holy majesty.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>holy</kanji> king has heard of you and your special <reading>sa</reading>ber (<ja>せい</ja>) that glows with pure, blue light. Specifically, the holy king wants to use it on his food!
readingInfo: The holy king heard you turned into a prosperous plate and used the saber to cut your food and now he wants to try it too. As he holds your saber, a holy circle forms around it, making it sparkle and shimmer! Your saber is holy now too!!
